citations.narrative:
Records of disposition of animals were not available for review at the time of inspection. A facility representative
confirmed that there was at least one litter of puppies that had been sold in the last year, however there were no records
of their sales. The facility stated that they were not familiar with the record keeping requirement for sales. Missing and
incomplete disposition information interferes with the inspection process, and the ability to track the movement of
regulated animals and ensure their humane care and use. The licensee must make, keep, and maintain records or forms
which fully and correctly disclose all of the required information in 2.75(a)(1) for dogs purchased or otherwise acquired,
owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, sold,
euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or exhibitor. The records shall include any offspring born of any
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. To be corrected from this day (03/04/2025) forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
Records of disposition of animals were not available for review at the time of inspection. A facility representative 
confirmed that there was at least one litter of puppies that had been sold in the last year, however there were no records 
of their sales. The facility stated that they were not familiar with the record keeping requirement for sales. Missing and 
incomplete disposition information interferes with the inspection process, and the ability to track the movement of 
regulated animals and ensure their humane care and use. The licensee must make, keep, and maintain records or forms 
which fully and correctly disclose all of the required information in 2.75(a)(1) for dogs purchased or otherwise acquired, 
owned, held, leased, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, sold, 
euthanized, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer or exhibitor. The records shall include any offspring born of any 
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. To be corrected from this day (03/04/2025) forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
